column1: #Text=Gun says : " Your Majesty , may I present Avatar Korra . "
#Text=Hou - Ting says : " You 're ruining the koi pond !
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " I am surrounded by idiots .
#Text=So , I finally get a visit from the Avatar .

#Text=" Korra says : " Well , actually Your Majesty , I was hoping you could ... " Hou - Ting says : " I hardly think you 're in a position to ask me for favors after everything the last Avatar did to the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=He and Fire Lord Zuko took advantage of my father 's weakness and stole our lands to make their own little empire .
#Text=The United Republic is Earth Kingdom territory !
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , I uh , I 'm not sure what I can do about that .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " Not that you care , but what 's left of my kingdom is falling to ruin .
#Text=Roving bands of barbarians are raiding villages in the countryside .
#Text=And now , some of my subjects are refusing to pay their taxes .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm very sorry for your troubles , but actually ... " Hou - Ting says : " That topiary is supposed to be an eel swan not a turtle duck !
